questions: What name is given to the period between childhood and adulthood ?

answers: The human body undergoes several changes during adolescence. These changes mark the onset of puberty.
Puberty ends when an adolescent reaches reproductive maturity.

questions: Write two changes which occur during puberty.
answers: Increase in height  Change in body shape.

questions: Why during adolescence voice of some boys becomes hoarse ?
answers: Because boys develop large voice boxes. It can be seen as a protruding part of the throat called Adam’s apple.

questions: Write a myth regarding body changes in adolescence.
answers: A girl gets pregnant if she looks at boys during menstruation.
